concept.title: Three Basic DITA Topic Types
concept.shortdesc: Learn about the fundamental DITA topic types: Concept, Task, and Reference.

conbody.p: DITA (Darwin Information Typing Architecture) is an XML-based framework for structuring, organizing, and managing content in a modular and reusable way. One of the fundamental concepts in DITA is the classification of content into different topic types, each designed to convey specific types of information.Following are the three basic DITA Topic Types:
